channel.title: Posts on Notre Dame Linux Users Group
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Notre Dame Linux Users Group

item.title: Will Markley Linux From Scratch
item.description: In the first NDLUG talk in the second half of the fall 2017 semester, Will Markley will talk about his experience with Linux From Scratch.

item.title: How to contribute
item.description: Motivation The NDLUG blog is a group effort, and so if you would like to contribute, we would like that to be as easy as possible. Simply follow these steps, and you can help make the blog great again. But How? First Steps First, the site is made using hugo, so it will probably be useful to have hugo installed. Follow their guide on installing hugo if you do not already have it installed.

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Test of the NDLUG blog! Test of the automatic Travis CI build system!
